title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 50 cm [20"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 33 cm [13"]  Selvedge right side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 25 cm [10"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 32 cm [12.5"] Selvedge right side, cut other side.
c. Warp: 18 cm [7"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 32 cm [12.5"] Cut both sides.
d. Warp: 31 cm [12"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 20.5 cm [8"]  Cut both sides.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. pink ground with flowers and ribbons
b. light blue ground with flowers and ribbons
c. green ground with flowers and ribbons
d. green ground with flowers and ribbons

tombstone.epitaph:
Samples, ca. 1910. a. Warp: 50 cm [20"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 33 cm [13"]  Selvedge right side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 25 cm [10"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 32 cm [12.5"] Selvedge right side, cut other side.
c. Warp: 18 cm [7"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 32 cm [12.5"] Cut both sides.
d. Warp: 31 cm [12"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 20.5 cm [8"]  Cut both sides.. Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott. 1989-80-12-a/d.
